<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1438983_coe_app_configuration_details</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1438983_coe_app_configuration_details">type_of_approval=2^EQ<item display_value="Parallel Approval" endquery="false" field="type_of_approval" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="2"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Approval Group</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
    gr.addQuery("group", "e19e3f0753a2da10f91579a0a0490e41");
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gs.info(current.ceo_approval + " " + previous.ceo_approval + "khak");
        if (current.ceo_approval == true && previous.ceo_approval == false) {
            gs.info(current.ceo_approval + " " + previous.ceo_approval);
            gr.initialize();
            gr.group = "e19e3f0753a2da10f91579a0a0490e41";
            gr.user = "b955984253661610f91579a0a0490e78";
            gr.insert();


        } else{
            var grr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
            grr.addEncodedQuery('group=e19e3f0753a2da10f91579a0a0490e41^user=b955984253661610f91579a0a0490e78');
            grr.query();
			if(grr.next()){
				grr.deleteRecord();
			}
        }
    }
    // if (current.cfo_approval == true && previous.cfo_approval == false) {
    //     gr.initialize();
    //     gr.group = "e19e3f0753a2da10f91579a0a0490e41";
    //     gr.user = "57d414ce53261610f91579a0a0490e29";
    //     gr.insert();


    // } else {
    //     gr.addQuery("user", "57d414ce53261610f91579a0a0490e29");
    // 	gr.query();
    //     gr.delete();
    // }
    // if (current.cdo_approval == true && previous.cdo_approval == false) {
    //     gr.initialize();
    //     gr.group = "e19e3f0753a2da10f91579a0a0490e41";
    //     gr.user = "2f2494ce53261610f91579a0a0490e9a";
    //     gr.insert();


    // } else {
    //     gr.addQuery("user", "2f2494ce53261610f91579a0a0490e9a");
    // 	gr.query();
    //     gr.delete();
    // }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sushmithaa.sivakumar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-23 14:33:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f102051f532ada10f91579a0a0490eee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Approval Group</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CoE App" source="x_1438983_coe_app">9f443481532a1210f91579a0a0490e30</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CoE App">9f443481532a1210f91579a0a0490e30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f102051f532ada10f91579a0a0490eee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bhuvaneswari.janarthanan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-23 15:54:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f102051f532ada10f91579a0a0490eee"/></record_update>
